001package edu.pdx.cs410J.junit;
002
003/**
004 * This class specifies the grades a student can get a section of
005 * a course
006 */
007public final class Grade {
008  /** A grade representing an A */
009  public static final Grade A = new Grade();
010
011  /** A grade representing an B */
012  public static final Grade B = new Grade();
013
014  /** A grade representing an C */
015  public static final Grade C = new Grade();
016
017  /** A grade representing an D */
018  public static final Grade D = new Grade();
019
020  /** A grade representing an F */
021  public static final Grade F = new Grade();
022
023  /**
024   * Private constructor so that no one else can make a grade.
025   */
026  private Grade() {
027
028  }
029
030}
